tests.prompt: SavingThrowInput and SavingThrowResult types exist in rulebooks/dnd5e/saves/ with all required fields
A roll of 10 with +3 modifier succeeds against DC 13 (10+3=13 >= 13). A roll of 9 with +3 fails against DC 13.
With advantage, MakeSavingThrow rolls two dice and uses the higher result
With disadvantage, MakeSavingThrow rolls two dice and uses the lower result
IsNat1 is true when roll is 1, IsNat20 is true when roll is 20, regardless of success/failure
All unit tests in rulebooks/dnd5e/saves/ pass with go test
